SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.view.GUI

Class GraphicalUI

java.lang.Object
javafx.application.Application
it.polimi.ingsw.view.GUI.GraphicalUI
All Implemented Interfaces:
UI
public class GraphicalUI extends javafx.application.Application implements UI
This class contains the GUI's methods. It is developed as an extension of UI, because it shares some base methods with the TextualUI
See Also:

  • TextualUI

    • joinGameWithNick

      public void joinGameWithNick(String nickname)
      Consents to a player to join the game's lobby using his nickname. It is also used as follows to link the first the scene with the second:

      Waits to reach the given players number, notifies the controller of the game's start then checks the second scene before displaying it.

      Parameters:
      nickname - the player's nickname.
      See Also:
      • Player
      • Game
      • GameController
